title: Genopanic
description:
Jump into Genopanic, a wild (NOT) metroidvania ride Wield a plasma cutter, boot up virtual doggo LAIK, outsmart sly cat-girl AI VOLGA – the station’s troublemaker, unravel the Dark Matter enigma , and explore DNA experiments in a cosmic adventure ROBOBEAT
Meet the adorably terrifying GMO critters that you’ll definitely want in your collection We don’t know what they were fed in the lab, but they won’t leave you indifferent.
Do you prefer flamethrowers or plasma cutters? Or maybe grav-guns tickle your fancy? Whatever you choose, we’re confident you’ll find the right weapon to defeat any mutant on your path
